briefdescription.para: subscribe a port connection

detaileddescription.para:
seq
sequencer handle
sub
subscription information
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Subscribes a connection between two ports. The subscription information is stored in sub argument.

briefdescription.para: unsubscribe a connection between ports

detaileddescription.para:
seq
sequencer handle
sub
subscription information to disconnect
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Unsubscribes a connection between two ports, described in sender and dest fields in sub argument.

query port subscriber list

detaileddescription.para:
seq
sequencer handle
subs
subscription to query
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Queries the subscribers accessing to a port. The query information is specified in subs argument.

At least, the client id, the port id, the index number and the query type must be set to perform a proper query. As the query type, SND_SEQ_QUERY_SUBS_READ or SND_SEQ_QUERY_SUBS_WRITE can be specified to check whether the readers or the writers to the port. To query the first subscription, set 0 to the index number. To list up all the subscriptions, call this function with the index numbers from 0 until this returns a negative value.
